website_summaries.verdict: Rust-proof and wear-proof set comes with all the vital knives.
pros: Comes with 6 stainless steel cheese knives and an easy-to-read and understand guide for all cheeses
cons: Does not come with any other accessories

customer_reviews.title: Made cutting cheese easier for our guests
customer_reviews.text: This cheese cutting set allow our guests to help themselves with ease. We recently hosted a party in our apartment and had a huge cheese board. During previous parties, we just use regular utensils which caused a mess because some cheeses are more dense and in various shapes. Try cutting aged Grana Panago with a butter knife in one hand and a glass of wine in the other. The Lunar set just made it so much easier this time around. Completely satisfied with this purchase. Nothing like having the right tools for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: —Feel free to ask me any questions about my review!— I love these! I’m always making my fiancé and I little cheese boards. This set has a lot of variety and the handles are comfortable to hold and use. I do hand wash them, though. I hope my description was of use to you! —Follow @CassandraMercedes on Instagram for more amazing Amazon finds!—
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mercedes Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Lovely cheese knife set.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and a shape and cutting blade for every type of cheese. These are dishwasher safe and very sharp. I would recommend them. I don't keep them in the box they came in but you could.
customer_reviews.author: SF Jan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cheese Knife Set
customer_reviews.text: This 6 piece cheese knife set is absolutely perfect for what I wanted. I recently bought a new beach house and we entertain a lot doing many happy hours when we serve cheese and crackers. I looked for a cheese knife set everywhere and this set is not only one of the least expensive but also one of the only ones that comes with 6 pieces instead of 5. They all have a very nice weight to them and have a modern look to them. You cannot go wrong ordering this cheese knife set at this price or at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Wolinsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of cheese knives - good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of knives, exactly as described and the stainless steel looks very nice and more expensive than they cost. I like the size and weight. Will probably hand wash and dry because of the potential rust spots that others have mentioned. Have only used once, but they washed nicely with soap and water and no spots at all.
customer_reviews.author: cathbarb

customer_reviews.title: You Stay Classy San Diego
customer_reviews.text: Bought this knife set after checking out similar options on amazon. Had a get-together with a few friends, and they were a big hit; maybe it was the wine :). Comes in a good variety for a number of different cheeses as well as a general guide for how to use and in which scenario. The set is elegant and definitely has a classy "edge" to it. The make quality is top notch. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Poozhikala

customer_reviews.title: Great knifes!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these knifes all the time, no issue at all. They work as intended and I'm thankful for the cheat sheet to tell me which knife to use. I bought these in November of 2019 and even with weekly use there is no rust on any of the blades. I do hand wash and dry the knifes when I'm done using them. Thank you for a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Lunar 6 piece Cheese Set, Great value and price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Lunar Premium 6 piece cheese knife set two days before my Christmas Party. Item arrived on time and in the morning, they were washed and ready to try out on my cheese platter. Nice quality and I received compliments on the matched set. Would definitely recommend this cheese set.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R S

customer_reviews.title: I love these small but mighty knives
customer_reviews.text: I've used 3 of the knives so far. I love these small but mighty knives. I've sliced up these cheeses with ease: brie, cheddar, pepper jack, feta. They don't take up a lot of room in my kitchen drawers, thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kwong

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excited about our 6-Piece Cheese Knife Set! Extremely Elegant! Can't wait to use it. We especially appreciated getting your email with the "Cheese Wheel Guide - A complete guide for different cheeses!" WOW that will be so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: DisneyButterfly32

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set and the seller provides a lot of information to help get you going on your cheese journey!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Crow

customer_reviews.title: Great gift set!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Nice feel and sharp blades. Am considering giving to niece for Christmas. My only comment is that I wish the set also had a cheese planet to slice thin even slices of hard cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of mismatched cheese knives when I served a cheese board. These are attractive, a great size and very sharp so effective. Would be a great gift.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Amazon purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is set is absolutely one of my favorite Amazon purchases!! It complements all of my charcuterie boards. It is a perfect gift for someone who enjoys entertaining. It is boxed perfectly for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I love the set. The set was incomplete. It is missing a fork tool. Instead I have 2 shaving tools. I would love it even more if the will send me the fork to complete the set.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set for all cheese lovers
customer_reviews.text: Knives have a good weight to them. I would encourage towel drying immediately after cleaning to avoid water marks/stains. Makes a great gift.

customer_reviews.text: Seems nice so far. Have used once. Appears sturdy and well made. Hope the blades stay sharp. Packaged well from a marketing standpoint.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection!
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of cheese serving pieces! I am anxious to use them on next cheese board.

customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for a good price. Anyone who entertains would enjoy using these.

They’re awesome, look amazing on the table and they’re great for the amount of money you spend!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: When I entertain, I always include a charcuterie/cheese board. I've always wanted a cheese knife set like this, and I finally got it for Christmas. I absolutely love it! I really like the fact that I can put out specific knives for certain cheeses, and people don't have to cross contaminate. Every entertainer who puts together cheese boards, should have this set!
customer_reviews.author: Bella12

customer_reviews.title: They rust quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute knife set which should fit your needs for presentation and function however, they rust. I used my set quickly after getting them, hand washed them and I had rust spots on them. I’ve tried scrubbing the spots out and scraping them with my nail but I’m going to have to research a more aggressive way to get the rust spots out.
customer_reviews.author: Beba217

customer_reviews.title: Super classy set

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!

Love the weight of the knives. They look more elegant than the cost would indicate. Totally satisfied with the purchase and will likely purchase a second set.

customer_reviews.title: These are very well made and look great. So far I have used them on Brie

I love the modern design of this knife set, looks like something I picked up at an art gallery gift shop. Super fancy. I bought this for myself, but I'm going to order a few more. I think they make great housewarming or host/ess gifts!

I did not have any quality cheese knives or spreaders. I read the positive reviews and saw the pictures of this Lunar 6 piece set and was sold! I even paid overnight shipping so it would be here in time for Thanksgiving. This is an amazing set.

customer_reviews.text: Look and work awesome. The only thing I don't like: I cannot bring myself to store them in original case because there is no way to wash/sanitize it. Soi store them just in plain plastic bag :( wish there was a case or small wooden block to 'showcase' them.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes knives will be heavy at the handle and fall off the serving tray easily but these will not
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the knives for when I entertain. They are small and will fit well on a cheese board or tray. They are light weight which is something I was looking for when I purchased the knives. Sometimes knives will be heavy at the handle and fall off the serving tray easily but these will not. I would recommend them.

product_meta.title: LUNAR Premium 6-Piece Cheese Knife Set - Complete Stainless Steel Cheese Knives Collection (Gift-Ready)
feature_bullets: ▶ COMPLETE 6-PIECE COLLECTION: This full Cheese Knife Set includes 4 cheese knives, 1 cheese fork and 1 cheese spreader and is everything you need to serve all of your favorite cheeses.
▶ IMPRESS YOUR GUESTS: Show off your beautiful set of stainless steel cheese knives at your next wine-tasting, potluck or backyard BBQ. They’ll be the new crowd favorites for any gathering.

▶ PERFECT GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION: Who doesn’t love cheese? The LUNAR Cheese Knives comes delivered to your door in our elegantly designed box – packaged and ready for a wedding, bridal shower, housewarming or a just-because present!
▶ PREMIUM FEEL AND SLEEK DESIGN: From the blade to the brushed handle, each knife in this set is crafted entirely from high-quality stainless steel.

▶ EASY-TO-USE FOR EVERYONE: Whether you’re a cheese expert or an all-round foodie, the solid and ergonomic design allows for a balanced and confident edge for slicing, spreading and serving soft and hard cheeses.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars382 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
